channel.title: Export data from document on Aspose.Cells Product Family
channel.description: Recent content in Export data from document on Aspose.Cells Product Family

item.title: Columns Containing Non-Strongly Typed Data
item.description: If all values in the columns of a worksheet are not strongly typed (that means the values in a column may have the different data types) then we can export the worksheet content by calling the ExportDataTableAsString method of the Cells class. ExportDataTableAsString method takes the same set of parameters as that of ExportDataTable method to export worksheet data as DataTable object. //Creating a file stream containing the Excel file to be opened

item.title: Columns Containing Strongly Typed Data
item.description: We know that a spreadsheet stores data as a sequence of rows and columns. If all values in the columns of a worksheet are strongly typed (that means all values in a column must have the same data type) then we can export the worksheet content by calling the ExportDataTable method of the Cells class. ExportDataTable method takes the following parameters to export worksheet data as DataTable object: Row Number , represents the row number of the first cell from where the data will be exported
